name: Carve
description: Focus your strength into a mighty swing, dealing 1742 Bleed Damage to enemies in front of you, and causing them to bleed for an additional 3594 Bleed Damage over 12 seconds.    Hitting a target that is already bleeding from this ability extends the duration by 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30.  You also gain a damage shield that absorbs 1742 damage for 6 seconds.
effectLines: Converts into Bleed Damage and applies a bleed over time to enemies hit.
coefDescription: Focus your strength into a mighty swing, dealing $1 Bleed Damage to enemies in front of you, and causing them to bleed for an additional $2 Bleed Damage over 12 seconds.    Hitting a target that is already bleeding from this ability extends the duration by 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30.  You also gain a damage shield that absorbs $3 damage for 6 seconds.
